item.description:
Freedom Writers 2007PG-13

122 minutesWhile her at-risk students are reading classics like The Diary of Anne Frank, a young teacher (Hilary Swank) asks them to keep journals about their troubled lives and apply history's lessons to break the cycle of violence and despair that threatens their futures.Â Scott Glenn, Imelda Staunton and Patrick Dempsey co-star in this moving drama based on real-life California educator Erin Gruwell's unorthodox methods.

Cast:Hilary Swank, Imelda Staunton, Ricardo Molina, Scott Glenn, Patrick DempseyDirector:Richard LaGraveneseGenres:Drama, Inspirational Stories, Blu-rayThis movie is:Emotional, Inspiring, Gritty

Vegetarian dinner from 7 to 8pm

Movie and analysis of personality types in movie at 8pm

$25, sliding scale to $20, $5 without dinner

Herb Pearce is a personality types expert, therapist, workshop leader and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, both available to purchase, as well as DVD and upcoming Enneagram for Advanced Students.
781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Dinner and Personality Types at the Movies - Freedom Writers
